description: The Hjellestad polo shirt is a sporty and practical piece, made in the softest mix of Merino wool and cotton. The quality feels luxurious and soft, but combined with the sporty design, it is such a versatile garment that will make you look chic and elegant for the harbor lunch as well. Wear it with the Lista pants for a timeless look that never goes out of style.
name: We Norwegians Hjellestad Polo - Mens
